txt.en: Give a tasty treat to a Hollin Ridge goat
Give a tasty treat to a Bindbole kid
Give a tasty treat to a Lune River goat
Radagast can be found in Rhosgobel.\n\nYou should speak with Radagast.
'Use the special food I have given you.'
Goats can be found all over Middle-earth.\n\nRescue goats using Radagast's calming treats.
'I am glad your travels were a success.'
Give a tasty treat to a Brandy Hills billy
Give a tasty treat to a High Moor goat
You give a tasty treat to the goat to calm him down!
You give a tasty treat to the goat to calm him down!
You give a tasty treat to the goat!
'Use the special food I have given you to befriend some goats. They'll be safe in Rhosgobel where I can tend to them. I'm counting on you, [placeholder].'
You give a tasty treat to the goat!
Speak with Radagast
Befriending Critters: Get One's Goat
You give a tasty treat to the goat!
Radagast the Brown asks you help him rescue goats and bring them back to the safety of Rhosgobel.
Now what do we have here?

'Ah, thank you! I see you were able to bring back a couple of goats with you. I am glad your travels were a success.\n\n'You have a good rapport with the animals. This skill will aid you on your journeys ahead.'
